taskbody.prereq: To ADD an address, log into your MyPack Portal

step.info: Look to the left hand navigation menu to find 'Addresses'

step.cmd: Select the 'Add Address' button for the appropriate header
step.info: For example, if the appropriate header is 'Diploma Address,' select the button 'Add Diploma Address'

step.cmd: Select the 'Copy From' button to copy the address from an address that is already on record, or manually enter an address in the given fields
